text: The 2018 Sport Clips Haircuts VFW 200 was a NASCAR Xfinity Series race held on September 1, 2018 at Darlington Raceway in Darlington, South Carolina. Contested over 147 laps on the egg-shaped oval, it was the 24th race of the 2018 NASCAR Xfinity Series season.Entry list: Numerical Darlington Raceway: 36th Annual Sport Clips Haircuts VFW 200 NASCAR ==Entry list== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" |- ! !
